hints.content:
We start with the total number of $\blue{97}$ pieces of confetti and subtract the $\pink{86}$ pieces of confetti that the vacuum cleaner picked up.

$\blue{97} - \pink{86} = \green{\square}$
There are $\green{11}$ pieces of confetti still on the floor.

question.content:
Happy New Year! After the party, there were $97$ pieces of confetti on the floor.  A vacuum cleaner was able to pick-up $86$ pieces of confetti.  
 
**How many pieces of confetti are still on the floor?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] pieces of confetti
